verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> had-da-Var The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> ha-Yah came אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu, that came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> me-'Et יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

שִׁמְע֕וּ <WH8085> shim-'U Hear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> div-Rei ye the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit of this covenant הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> haz-Zot; likewise וְדִבַּרְתָּם֙ <WH1696> ve-dib-bar-Tam and speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish unto the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and to יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei and to the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta And say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem, to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> 'a-Mar thou unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel אָר֣וּר <WH779> 'a-Rur Cursed הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish, [be] the man אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo does not יִשְׁמַ֔ע <WH8085> yish-Ma', that obeyeth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> div-Rei not the words הַבְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit of this covenant הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> haz-Zot. likewise

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which צִוִּ֣יתִי <WH6680> tziv-Vi-ti Which I commanded אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֡ם <WH1> a-vo-tei-Chem your fathers בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in the day הוֹצִיאִֽי־ <WH3318> ho-tzi-'i- [that] I brought them forth אוֹתָ֣ם <WH853> o-Tam מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> me-'e-retz- out of the land מִצְרַיִם֩ <WH4714> mitz-ra-Yim of Egypt מִכּ֨וּר <WH3564> mik-Kur furnace הַבַּרְזֶ֜ל <WH1270> hab-bar-Zel from the iron לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying שִׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> shim-'U Obey בְקוֹלִי֙ <WH6963> ve-ko-Li my voice וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <WH6213> va-'a-si-Tem and do אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> o-Tam, כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which אֲצַוֶּ֖ה <WH6680> 'a-tzav-Veh them according to all which I command אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> 'et-Chem; וִהְיִ֤יתֶם <WH1961> vih-Yi-tem become לִי֙ <WH99999> li לְעָ֔ם <WH5971> le-'Am, you so shall ye be my people וְאָ֣נֹכִ֔י <WH595> ve-'A-no-Chi, I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> 'eh-Yeh become לָכֶ֖ם <WH99999> la-Chem לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> le-lo-Him. and I will be your God

לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> le-ma-'An order הָקִ֨ים <WH6965> ha-Kim That I may perform אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשְּׁבוּעָ֜ה <WH7621> hash-she-vu-'Ah the oath אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתִּי <WH7650> nish-Ba'-ti which I have sworn לַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH1> la-'a-vo-tei-Chem, unto your fathers לָתֵ֤ת <WH5414> la-Tet to give לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> la-Hem them אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz them a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> za-Vat flowing חָלָ֛ב <WH2461> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבַ֖שׁ <WH1706> u-de-Vash and honey כַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> kai-Yom as [it is] this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; this וָאַ֥עַן <WH6030> va-'A-'an Then answered וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar I and said אָמֵ֥ן׀ <WH543> 'a-Men So be it יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. God ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh Then the LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me קְרָ֨א <WH7121> ke-Ra unto me Proclaim אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֤ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim all these words הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> ha-'El-leh these בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> be-'a-Rei in the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וּבְחֻצ֥וֹת <WH2351> u-ve-chu-Tzot and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying שִׁמְע֗וּ <WH8085> shim-'U, Hear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> div-Rei ye the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit of this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, likewise וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> va-'a-si-Tem and do אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> o-Tam.

כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki for הָעֵ֨ד <WH5749> ha-'Ed For I earnestly הַעִדֹ֜תִי <WH5749> ha-'i-Do-ti protested בַּאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH1> ba-'a-vo-tei-Chem, unto your fathers בְּיוֹם֩ <WH3117> be-yOm in the day הַעֲלוֹתִ֨י <WH5927> ha-'a-lo-Ti [that] I brought them up אוֹתָ֜ם <WH853> o-Tam מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom [even] unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, to this הַשְׁכֵּ֥ם <WH7925> hash-Kem rising early וְהָעֵ֖ד <WH5749> ve-ha-'Ed and protesting לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> shim-'U Obey בְּקוֹלִֽי׃ <WH6963> be-ko-Li. my voice

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo not שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> sha-me-'U Yet they obeyed וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- or הִטּ֣וּ <WH5186> hit-Tu not nor inclined אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אָזְנָ֔ם <WH241> 'a-ze-Nam, their ear וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <WH1980> vai-Ye-le-Chu, walked אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every one בִּשְׁרִיר֖וּת <WH8307> bish-ri-Rut in the imagination לִבָּ֣ם <WH3820> lib-Bam heart הָרָ֑ע <WH7451> ha-Ra'; of their evil וָאָבִ֨יא <WH935> va-'a-Vi therefore I will bring עֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem and אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all דִּבְרֵ֧י <WH1697> div-Rei upon them all the words הַבְּרִית־ <WH1285> hab-be-rit- of this covenant הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> haz-Zot likewise אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which צִוִּ֥יתִי <WH6680> tziv-Vi-ti which I commanded לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot [them] to do וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo to עָשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> 'a-Su. but they did ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלָ֑י <WH413> 'e-Lai; about נִֽמְצָא־ <WH4672> nim-tza- is found קֶ֙שֶׁר֙ <WH7195> ke-sher unto me A conspiracy בְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> be-'Ish among the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וּבְיֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> u-ve-yo-she-Vei and among the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem

שָׁ֩בוּ֩ <WH7725> sha-vu They are turned back עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto עֲוֹנֹ֨ת <WH5771> 'a-vo-Not to the iniquities אֲבוֹתָ֜ם <WH1> a-vo-Tam with their fathers הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֗ים <WH7223> ha-ri-sho-Nim, of their ancestors אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who מֵֽאֲנוּ֙ <WH3985> me-'a-Nu which refused לִשְׁמ֣וֹעַ <WH8085> lish-Mo-a' to hear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דְּבָרַ֔י <WH1697> de-va-Rai, my words וְהֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> ve-Hem-mah and they הָלְכ֗וּ <WH1980> ha-le-Chu, and they went אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <WH312> 'a-che-Rim other לְעָבְדָ֑ם <WH5647> le-'a-ve-Dam; to serve הֵפֵ֤רוּ <WH6565> he-Fe-ru have broken בֵֽית־ <WH1004> veit- them the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> u-Veit and the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֕י <WH1285> be-ri-Ti my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which כָּרַ֖תִּי <WH3772> ka-Rat-ti which I made אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> a-vo-Tam. their fathers ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold מֵבִ֤יא <WH935> me-Vi Behold I will bring אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem about רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah, evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not יוּכְל֖וּ <WH3201> yu-che-Lu upon them which they shall not be able לָצֵ֣את <WH3318> la-Tzet to escape מִמֶּ֑נָּה <WH4480> mi-Men-nah; they וְזָעֲק֣וּ <WH2199> ve-za-'a-Ku and though they shall cry אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, about וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo I will not אֶשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> 'esh-Ma' unto me I will not hearken אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem. about

וְהָֽלְכ֞וּ <WH1980> ve-ha-le-Chu go עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> 'a-Rei Then shall the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵי֙ <WH3427> ve-yo-she-Vei and inhabitants יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-Ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem וְזָֽעֲקוּ֙ <WH2199> ve-za-'a-Ku and cry אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, unto the gods אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> 'a-Sher to whom הֵ֥ם <WH1992> hem they מְקַטְּרִ֖ים <WH6999> me-kat-te-Rim unto whom they offer incense לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; וְהוֹשֵׁ֛עַ <WH3467> ve-ho-She-a' but they shall not save לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- will not יוֹשִׁ֥יעוּ <WH3467> yo-Shi-'u them at all לָהֶ֖ם <WH99999> la-Hem בְּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> be-'Et in the time רָעָתָֽם׃ <WH7451> ra-'a-Tam. of their trouble

כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki are as מִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> mis-Par For [according to] the number עָרֶ֔יךָ <WH5892> 'a-Rei-cha, of thy cities הָי֥וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha were thy gods יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; O Judah וּמִסְפַּ֞ר <WH4557> u-mis-Par and [according to] the number חֻצ֣וֹת <WH2351> chu-Tzot of the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem שַׂמְתֶּ֤ם <WH7760> sam-Tem have ye set up מִזְבְּחוֹת֙ <WH4196> miz-be-chOt altars לַבֹּ֔שֶׁת <WH1322> lab-Bo-shet, to [that] shameful thing מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <WH4196> miz-be-Chot [even] altars לְקַטֵּ֥ר <WH6999> le-kat-Ter to burn incense לַבָּֽעַל׃ <WH1168> lab-Ba-'al. unto Baal ס sa-Mek

וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah, you אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nor תִּתְפַּלֵּל֙ <WH6419> tit-pal-Lel Therefore pray בְּעַד־ <WH1157> be-'ad- because הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> ha-'Am not thou for this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, he וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- nor תִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> tis-Sa neither lift up בַעֲדָ֖ם <WH1157> va-'a-Dam because רִנָּ֣ה <WH7440> rin-Nah a cry וּתְפִלָּ֑ה <WH8605> u-te-fil-Lah; or prayer כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אֵינֶ֣נִּי <WH369> 'ei-Nen-ni for שֹׁמֵ֗עַ <WH8085> sho-Me-a', for them for I will not hear בְּעֵ֛ת <WH6256> be-'Et [them] in the time קָרְאָ֥ם <WH7121> ka-re-'Am that they cry אֵלַ֖י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> be-'Ad because רָעָתָֽם׃ <WH7451> ra-'a-Tam. unto me for their trouble ס sa-Mek

מֶ֣ה <WH4100> meh What לִֽידִידִ֞י <WH3039> li-di-Di What hath my beloved בְּבֵיתִ֗י <WH1004> be-vei-Ti, to do in mine house עֲשׂוֹתָ֤הּ <WH6213> a-so-Tah [seeing] she hath wrought הַֽמְזִמָּ֙תָה֙ <WH4209> ham-zim-Ma-tah lewdness הָֽרַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> ha-rab-Bim, with many וּבְשַׂר־ <WH1320> u-ve-sar- flesh קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh and the holy יַעַבְר֣וּ <WH5674> ya-'av-Ru is passed מֵֽעָלָ֑יִךְ <WH5921> me-'a-La-yich; and כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki When רָעָתֵ֖כִי <WH7451> ra-'a-Te-chi from thee;when thou doest evil אָ֥ז <WH227> 'az So תַּעֲלֹֽזִי׃ <WH5937> ta-'a-Lo-zi. then thou rejoicest

זַ֤יִת <WH2132> Za-yit olive tree רַֽעֲנָן֙ <WH7488> ra-'a-Nan A green יְפֵ֣ה <WH3303> ye-Peh fair פְרִי־ <WH6529> fe-ri- fruit תֹ֔אַר <WH8389> To-'ar, [and] of goodly קָרָ֥א <WH7121> ka-Ra called יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD שְׁמֵ֑ךְ <WH8034> she-Mech; thy name לְק֣וֹל׀ <WH6963> le-Kol with the noise הֲמוּלָּ֣ה <WH1999> ha-mul-Lah tumult גְדֹלָ֗ה <WH1419> ge-do-Lah, of a great הִצִּ֥ית <WH3341> hitz-Tzit he hath kindled אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> 'esh fire עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha, and וְרָע֖וּ <WH7489> ve-ra-'U of it are broken דָּלִיּוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1808> da-li-yo-Tav. upon it and the branches
